item.title: 消息人士称，收购公司 NGP 寻求以 20 亿美元出售天然气生产商 Camino
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士周四透露，私募股权公司 NGP Energy Capital Management 正在探索出售天然气生产商卡米诺自然资源公司（Camino Natural Resources），包括债务在内的估值可能达到 20 亿美元左右。【原文：Private equity firm NGP Energy Capital Management is exploring a sale of natural gas producer Camino Natural Resources, which may achieve a valuation of around $2 billion including debt, sources familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 备忘录称，高盛集团的瑞安-诺兰将在 13 年后离开该行
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份备忘录，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）技术、媒体和电信部门合伙人兼软件投资银行业务全球联席主管 Ryan Nolan 即将离开该行。【原文：Goldman Sachs' Ryan Nolan, a partner in the technology, media and telecommunications group and global co-head of software investment banking, is leaving the bank, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛加拿大公司将投资 40 多亿美元扩建门店和供应链
item.description: 沃尔玛加拿大公司周四表示，将投资约 65 亿加元（45.1 亿美元）建设新店并扩大供应链，这是该公司自近 30 年前开设第一家门店以来的最大一笔投资。【原文：Walmart Canada said on Thursday it is investing about C$6.5 billion ($4.51 billion) to build new stores and expand its supply chain, marking its biggest ever investment since opening its first store nearly 30 years ago.】

item.title: 华丽七重奏 "收益落地，股市上涨；黄金接近历史纪录
item.description: 华尔街股市周四反弹，原因是投资者对美达公司（Meta）的财报欢欣鼓舞，但对微软公司（Microsoft）的财报避之不及，同时美元汇率下跌，进一步提振了金价。【原文：Wall Street shares rallied on Thursday, as investors cheered earnings from Meta , but shunned Microsoft , while the dollar dipped, further boosting gold prices.】

item.title: 富国银行投资银行业务联席首席执行官乔恩-韦斯将卸任
item.description: 富国银行企业与投资银行部（CIB）联席首席执行官乔恩-韦斯（Jon Weiss）周四表示，他已通知银行有意退休，并将从即日起卸任。【原文：Wells Fargo's co-CEO of corporate and investment banking (CIB), Jon Weiss, has informed the bank of his intention to retire and will step down from his position effective immediately, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，ITV与红鸟国际传媒集团（RedBird IMI）就合并制片业务举行早期谈判
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，英国广播公司 ITV 已与阿布扎比支持的集团 RedBird IMI 就合并各自制作业务的可能性进行了早期谈判。【原文：British broadcaster ITV has been holding early stage talks with Abu Dhabi-backed group RedBird IMI about a possible merger of their respective production businesses, two people with knowledge of the situation said.】

item.title: 美国成屋待完成销售下降，中断四个月涨势
item.description: 由于较高的抵押贷款利率削弱了人们的承受能力，价格较高的东北部和西部地区的购房合同下降尤为明显。【原文：Contracts to buy U.S. previously owned homes fell in December to snap a four-month streak of increases, with particularly sharp declines in the pricier Northeast and West regions as higher mortgage interest rates dented affordability.】

item.title: 大陆集团康迪泰克事业部将关闭在德国的四家工厂
item.description: 德国汽车零部件供应商大陆集团（ContiTech）旗下的康迪泰克公司（ContiTech）周四表示，将全面关闭四家工厂，并对另外两家工厂进行人事调整，受影响员工总数将达到 580 人。【原文：German car parts supplier Continental's ContiTech division is to fully close down four plants and make personnel changes at two other sites, affecting a total of 580 employees, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国证交会审理艾伦-斯坦福巨额欺诈案结案，法官下令罚款
item.description: 一名联邦法官下令结束美国证券交易委员会对艾伦-斯坦福 72 亿美元庞氏骗局长达 16 年之久的诉讼，指示这位金融家和两位前同事支付大部分将无法收回的款项。【原文：A federal judge ordered an end to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's 16-year-old lawsuit over Allen Stanford's $7.2 billion Ponzi scheme, directing the financier and two former colleagues to pay sums that will go largely uncollected.】

item.title: 大型央行从 2025 年开始走向不同方向
item.description: 2025 年的首次央行会议表明，随着美国维持利率稳定、欧元区下调利率、日本坚定地开启加息模式，今年将是政策制定者各行其是、经济走势分化的一年。【原文：The first central bank meetings of 2025 suggest it will be a year in which policymakers go their own way as economic paths diverge, as the United States holds interest rates steady, the euro zone cuts, and outlier Japan is firmly in hiking mode.】

item.title: ASML 将停止公布最受关注的指标 - 预订额
item.description: 顶级计算机芯片设备制造商阿斯麦公司（ASML）决定停止公布其季度财报中最受关注的数据--新订单预订量，称这一数据过于 "多变"，导致其股价波动过大。【原文：Top computer chip equipment maker ASML has decided to stop publishing the most closely-watched figure in its quarterly financial results, new order bookings, saying it is too "lumpy" and leads to excessive volatility in its share price.】

item.title: 自主技术初创公司 Avride 与 Grubhub 合作推出送餐机器人
item.description: 自主技术初创公司 Avride 周四表示，它已与食品配送公司 Grubhub 合作，在全美大学校园部署其机器人。【原文：Autonomous technology startup Avride said on Thursday it has partnered with food delivery company Grubhub to deploy its robots on college campuses across the United States.】

item.title: 企业争先恐后地在潜在关税前将货物运往美国
item.description: 最近几个月，许多企业高管都表示，他们对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普广泛的关税威胁采取观望态度。早前发布的假日季度财报显示，许多企业高管并未采取观望态度。【原文：In recent months, plenty of business executives have said they were taking a wait-and-see approach to U.S. President Donald Trump's broad threats of tariffs. Early holiday-quarter earnings reports show many of them were not.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数降幅超过预期
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数降幅超过预期，这表明尽管失业者的工作机会越来越少，但裁员率却很低。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits fell more than expected last week, pointing to low layoffs though job opportunities are becoming scarce for those who are out of work.】

item.title: 阿尔特里亚公司（Altria）年度利润疲软，Vape 竞争白热化
item.description: 万宝路（Marlboro）生产商阿尔特里亚公司（Altria）周四表示，其年度调整后利润可能低于预期，原因是来自竞争对手吸食器市场的竞争日益激烈，以及卷烟需求持续疲软。【原文：Marlboro maker Altria said on Thursday its annual adjusted profit could be lower than estimated, citing rising competition from rival vapes in the market and persistently weaker demand for cigarettes.】

item.title: 美国第四季度经济放缓，支出强劲
item.description: 美国第四季度经济增长放缓，但强劲的国内需求可能会使美联储今年继续缓慢降息。【原文：U.S. economic growth slowed in the fourth quarter, but robust domestic demand will probably keep the Federal Reserve on a slow interest rate cut path this year.】

item.title: Altria 的 "无烟 "目标受到非法吸食器的威胁
item.description: 万宝路（Marlboro）香烟的制造商阿尔特里亚公司（Altria）周四表示，由于一次性吸管的竞争，该公司可能无法实现其 2028 年在美国市场上销售吸烟替代品的目标。【原文：Altria , the maker of Marlboro cigarettes, has placed under review its 2028 goals for selling alternatives to smoking on the U.S. market, saying on Thursday it may not be able to meet them because of competition from disposable vapes.】

item.title: 欧洲央行降息并继续推出更多宽松政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四一如预期降息，并继续推出更多宽松政策，坚持其观点，即尽管全球贸易令人担忧，但欧元区的通胀正日益受到控制。【原文：The European Central Bank cut interest rates as expected on Thursday and kept more easing on the table, sticking to its view that inflation in the euro zone is increasingly under control despite concerns about global trade.】

item.title: 贝克休斯与 Venture Global 签订供应协议
item.description: 贝克-休斯（Baker Hughes）周四表示，该公司已签署一项协议，为 Venture Global 在美国的项目提供动力岛和液化列车系统支持。【原文：Baker Hughes said on Thursday it has signed an agreement to supply power island and liquefaction train systems to support Venture Global's projects in the United States.】

item.title: L3Harris 预计全年销售额将因国防需求强劲而增长
item.description: 受全球地缘政治紧张局势下国防开支增加导致武器需求强劲的推动，L3Harris Technologies 预计 2025 年销售额将高于预期，并于周四公布了高于预期的第四季度业绩。【原文：L3Harris Technologies forecast 2025 sales above estimates and posted higher-than-expected fourth-quarter results on Thursday, bolstered by strong demand for weapons due to higher defense spending amid global geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 由于需求疲软，Sherwin-Williams 预计年度利润低于预期
item.description: 受需求持续低迷的影响，涂料生产商 Sherwin-Williams 周四预计本年度调整后利润低于分析师预期。【原文：Paint maker Sherwin-Williams on Thursday forecast current-year adjusted profit below analysts' expectations, hurt by continued demand choppiness.】

item.title: 万事达卡利润因消费者支出回升而大幅增长
item.description: 周四，万事达卡公布第四季度利润增长，原因是经济复苏鼓励消费者在假日季节增加消费。【原文：Mastercard reported a higher fourth-quarter profit on Thursday as a resilient economy encouraged consumers to ramp up spending in the holiday season.】

item.title: 住宅建筑商 PulteGroup 公布乐观的季度业绩；增加股票回购
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商普尔特集团（PulteGroup）周四公布的第四季度业绩超出华尔街预期，原因是尽管抵押贷款利率居高不下，但战略促销活动仍助推了住宅销售，使其股价在盘前上涨超过 3%。【原文：U.S. homebuilder PulteGroup beat Wall Street estimates for its fourth-quarter results on Thursday, as strategic promotions helped boost home sales despite high mortgage rates, sending its shares up more than 3% in premarket.】

item.title: 海德堡材料公司押注特朗普执政下的美国市场
item.description: 世界第二大水泥生产商海德堡材料公司希望 2025 年在美国开展更多业务，并相信唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策将促进其业务发展。【原文：Heidelberg Materials , the world's second-largest cement maker, wants to do more deals in the U.S. in 2025 and is confident the policies of President Donald Trump will boost its business.】

item.title: 小型经济体的中期违约风险可能上升
item.description: 金融顾问拉扎德（Lazard）表示，尽管发展中国家已经摆脱了一系列主权违约事件，但世界上一些最小的经济体，尤其是非洲经济体，在中期内无力偿还债务的风险可能会增加。【原文：Some of the world's smallest economies, especially in Africa, could be at increased risk of being unable to pay their debts in the medium term, even as developing nations have emerged from a series of sovereign defaults, financial adviser Lazard said.】

item.title: 关税威胁下，H&M 加速向地区供应链转型
item.description: 瑞典快速时尚零售商H&M公司财务总监周四告诉路透社，该公司正努力从更靠近其欧洲和美国主要市场的供应商那里购买更多的服装和配饰，部分原因是为了应对美国可能征收的进口关税。【原文：Swedish fast-fashion retailer H&M is working to buy more of its clothes and accessories from suppliers closer to its key markets in Europe and the U.S., its finance chief told Reuters on Thursday, in part to prepare for potential U.S. import tariffs.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金在市场受挫的情况下仍坚持可再生能源投资
item.description: 挪威的1.8万亿美元财富基金是世界上最大的财富基金，该基金的一位高级官员周四表示，尽管近期市场遭遇挫折，但该基金仍将致力于可再生资产投资，并将在上市市场和私人市场寻找机会。【原文：Norway's $1.8 trillion wealth fund, the world's largest, remains committed to investments in renewable assets despite recent market setbacks and will seek opportunities in both the listed and private markets, a senior fund official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 邪恶 "助推康卡斯特收入强劲，缓冲宽带用户损失
item.description: 康卡斯特（Comcast）周四公布的第四季度营收超过预期，原因是包括《邪恶》（Wicked）在内的假日大片的上映弥补了宽带用户人数的下降，但下降幅度超出预期。【原文：Comcast surpassed fourth-quarter revenue estimates on Thursday as blockbuster holiday releases, including "Wicked", more than made up for a larger-than-expected decline in broadband customers.】

item.title: 尽管 DeepSeek 兴起，ABB 首席执行官仍看好数据中心业务的增长
item.description: ABB 首席执行官莫滕-维罗德（Morten Wierod）周四表示，尽管中国的 DeepSeek 公司有望推出能耗更低的人工智能模型，但 ABB 预计数据中心市场对其电气化产品的需求将会增加。【原文：ABB expects increased demand from the data centre market for its electrification products, CEO Morten Wierod said on Thursday, despite the promise of lower-energy AI models from China's DeepSeek.】

item.title: 由于中国市场对其自动驾驶技术的需求疲软，Mobileye 的年收入低于预期目标
item.description: Mobileye Global 周四预测 2025 财年营收低于华尔街预期，预计其辅助驾驶技术在中国的出货量将减少，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌超过 12%。【原文：Mobileye Global forecast fiscal 2025 revenue below Wall Street expectations on Thursday, anticipating fewer shipments of its assisted driving technology to China, sending its shares down more than 12% in premarket trading.】
